title: Towers aint safe
body: When ur pushed under ur tower, thats the moment when your enemy is going to poke you the most. They WILL take advantage of you having to cs under tower to get free poke on you. I see so many people complaining about playing passive and their opponent still shitting on them when theyre under tower. The safest place is  slightly infront of your tower. Your welcome. ( yes im aware im silver 3 atm and " i have no business giving advice" )
